text:
TradeGecko | Singapore, Toronto | Multiple Openings | ONSITE

TradeGecko is a post-series A B2B SaaS company headquartered in Singapore, but serving customers globally. We're building the software platform on which commerce companies are built.

We've got a couple of openings... Multiple Ruby on Rails Backend Devs - looking for some mid and senior level people, also looking for strong Frontend/ Javascript Ember.js Developers.

If you're smart we don't care about qualifications, just wanted to hire people who want to get stuff done. Will assist with Visas in Singapore.

Can email me directly - cameron@tradegecko.com otherwise roles are here: http://tradegecko.workable.com
